subject: The Perl Conference in Pittsburgh 2019
header: If you happen to be in and around Pittsburgh between June 16-21 then do attend the conference. For more information, checkout the page for more information.
Please do share your experience with us at the end of the conference.
Have a great and fun week.

entries.title: Simple Event Correlator v2.8.2
entries.author: dean_hamstead
entries.text: SEC is a lightweight and platform-independent event correlator which runs as a single process. The user can start it as a daemon, employ it in shell pipelines, execute it interactively in a terminal, run many SEC processes simultaneously for different tasks, and use it in a wide variety of other ways.
